00052 #define ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(resval) {                                      \
00053 if ((resval) < 0) {                                                 \
00054 if (verbose > 0) ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "OnError cleanup\n");    \
00055 goto Cleanup;                                                   \
00056 }                                                                   \
00057 }
00058 
00059 #define ON_NULL_CLEANUP(resval) {                                       \
00060 if ((resval) == NULL) {                                             \
00061 if (verbose > 0) ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "OnNull cleanup\n");      \
00062 goto Cleanup;                                                   \
00063 }                                                                   \
00064 }
00065 
00066 #define ON_ERROR_EXIT(resval, msg) {                                    \
00067 int _resval = (resval);                                             \
00068 if (_resval < 0)                                                     \
00069 ccndc_fatal(__LINE__, "fatal error, res = %d, %s\n", _resval, msg);  \
00070 }
00071 
00072 struct ccndc_data *
00073 ccndc_initialize_data(void) {
00074     struct ccndc_data *self;
00075     const char *msg = "Unable to initialize ccndc";
00076     int res;
00077     
00078     self = calloc(1, sizeof(*self));
00079     if (self == NULL) {
00080         ON_ERROR_EXIT (-1, msg);
00081     }
00082     
00083     self->ccn_handle = ccn_create();
00084     ON_ERROR_EXIT(ccn_connect(self->ccn_handle, NULL), "Unable to connect to local ccnd");
00085     ON_ERROR_EXIT(ccndc_get_ccnd_id(self), "Unable to obtain ID of local ccnd");
00086     
00087     /* Set up an Interest template to indicate scope 1 (Local) */
00088     self->local_scope_template = ccn_charbuf_create();
00089     res = ccnb_element_begin(self->local_scope_template, CCN_DTAG_Interest);
00090     res |= ccnb_element_begin(self->local_scope_template, CCN_DTAG_Name);
00091     res |= ccnb_element_end(self->local_scope_template);        /* </Name> */
00092     res |= ccnb_tagged_putf(self->local_scope_template, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "1");
00093     res |= ccnb_element_end(self->local_scope_template);        /* </Interest> */
00094     ON_ERROR_EXIT(res, msg);
00095     
00096     /* Create a null name */
00097     self->no_name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00098     ON_ERROR_EXIT(ccn_name_init(self->no_name), msg);
00099     
00100     self->lifetime = (~0U) >> 1;
00101     
00102     return self;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void
00106 ccndc_destroy_data(struct ccndc_data **data) {
00107     struct ccndc_data *self = *data;
00108     
00109     if (self != NULL) {
00110         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&self->no_name);
00111         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&self->local_scope_template);
00112         ccn_disconnect(self->ccn_handle);
00113         ccn_destroy(&self->ccn_handle);
00114         free(self);
00115         *data = NULL;
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 int
00121 ccndc_dispatch_cmd(struct ccndc_data *ccndc,
00122                    int check_only,
00123                    const char *cmd,
00124                    const char *options,
00125                    int num_options)
00126 {
00127     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "add") == 0) {
00128         if (num_options >= 0 && (num_options < 3 || num_options > 7))
00129             return INT_MIN;
00130         return ccndc_add(ccndc, check_only, options);
00131     }
00132     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "del") == 0) {
00133         if (num_options >= 0 && (num_options < 3 || num_options > 7))
00134             return INT_MIN;
00135         return ccndc_del(ccndc, check_only, options);
00136     }
00137     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "create") == 0) {
00138         if (num_options >= 0 && (num_options < 2 || num_options > 5))
00139             return INT_MIN;
00140         return ccndc_create(ccndc, check_only, options);
00141     }
00142     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "destroy") == 0) {
00143         if (num_options >= 0 && (num_options < 2 || num_options > 5))
00144             return INT_MIN;
00145         return ccndc_destroy(ccndc, check_only, options);
00146     }
00147     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "destroyface") == 0) {
00148         if (num_options >= 0 && num_options != 1)
00149             return INT_MIN;
00150         return ccndc_destroyface(ccndc, check_only, options);
00151     }
00152     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "srv") == 0) {
00153         // attempt to guess parameters using SRV record of a domain in search list
00154         if (num_options >= 0 && num_options != 0)
00155             return INT_MIN;
00156         if (check_only) return 0;
00157         return ccndc_srv(ccndc, NULL, 0);
00158     }
00159     if (strcasecmp(cmd, "renew") == 0) {
00160         if (num_options >= 0 && (num_options < 3 || num_options > 7))
00161             return INT_MIN;
00162         return ccndc_renew(ccndc, check_only, options);
00163     }
00164     return INT_MIN;
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 #define GET_NEXT_TOKEN(_cmd, _token_var) do {       \
00169 _token_var = strsep(&_cmd, " \t");             \
00170 } while (_token_var != NULL && _token_var[0] == 0);
00171 
00172 /*
00173  *   uri (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00174  *   uri face faceid
00175  */
00176 int
00177 ccndc_add(struct ccndc_data *self,
00178           int check_only,
00179           const char *cmd_orig)
00180 {
00181     int ret_code = -1;
00182     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00183     char *cmd_uri = NULL;
00184     char *cmd_proto = NULL;
00185     char *cmd_host = NULL;
00186     char *cmd_port = NULL;
00187     char *cmd_flags = NULL;
00188     char *cmd_mcastttl = NULL;
00189     char *cmd_mcastif = NULL;
00190     struct ccn_face_instance *face = NULL;
00191     struct ccn_face_instance *newface = NULL;
00192     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *prefix = NULL;
00193     
00194     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00195         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00196         return -1;
00197     }
00198     
00199     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00200     if (cmd == NULL) {
00201         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00202         return -1;
00203     }            
00204     cmd_token = cmd;
00205     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_uri);
00206     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_proto);
00207     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_host);
00208     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_port);
00209     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_flags);
00210     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastttl);
00211     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastif);
00212     
00213     // perform sanity checking
00214     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, cmd_proto, cmd_host, cmd_port,
00215                                    cmd_mcastttl, cmd_mcastif, (~0U) >> 1);
00216     prefix = parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(self, cmd_uri, cmd_flags, self->lifetime);
00217     if (face == NULL || prefix == NULL)
00218         goto Cleanup;
00219     
00220     if (!check_only) {
00221         if (0 != strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "face")) {
00222             newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00223             if (newface == NULL) {
00224                 ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00225                 goto Cleanup;
00226             }
00227             prefix->faceid = newface->faceid;
00228             ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00229         } else {
00230             prefix->faceid = face->faceid;
00231         }
00232         ret_code = ccndc_do_prefix_action(self, "prefixreg", prefix);
00233         if (ret_code < 0) {
00234             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot register prefix [%s]\n", cmd_uri);
00235             goto Cleanup;
00236         }
00237     }  
00238     ret_code = 0;
00239 Cleanup:
00240     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00241     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&prefix);
00242     free(cmd);
00243     return (ret_code);
00244 }
00245

00247 int
00248 ccndc_del(struct ccndc_data *self,
00249           int check_only,
00250           const char *cmd_orig)
00251 {
00252     int ret_code = -1;
00253     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00254     char *cmd_uri = NULL;
00255     char *cmd_proto = NULL;
00256     char *cmd_host = NULL;
00257     char *cmd_port = NULL;
00258     char *cmd_flags = NULL;
00259     char *cmd_mcastttl = NULL;
00260     char *cmd_mcastif = NULL;
00261     struct ccn_face_instance *face = NULL;
00262     struct ccn_face_instance *newface = NULL;
00263     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *prefix = NULL;
00264     
00265     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00266         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00267         return -1;
00268     }
00269     
00270     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00271     if (cmd == NULL) {
00272         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00273         return -1;
00274     }            
00275     cmd_token = cmd;
00276     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_uri);
00277     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_proto);
00278     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_host);
00279     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_port);
00280     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_flags);
00281     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastttl);
00282     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastif);
00283     
00284     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, cmd_proto, cmd_host, cmd_port,
00285                                    cmd_mcastttl, cmd_mcastif, (~0U) >> 1);
00286     prefix = parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(self, cmd_uri, cmd_flags, (~0U) >> 1);
00287     if (face == NULL || prefix == NULL)
00288         goto Cleanup;
00289     
00290     if (!check_only) {
00291         if (0 != strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "face")) {
00292             newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00293             if (newface == NULL) {
00294                 ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00295                 goto Cleanup;
00296             }
00297             prefix->faceid = newface->faceid;
00298             ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00299         } else {
00300             prefix->faceid = face->faceid;
00301         }
00302         ret_code = ccndc_do_prefix_action(self, "unreg", prefix);
00303         if (ret_code < 0) {
00304             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot unregister prefix [%s]\n", cmd_uri);
00305             goto Cleanup;
00306         }
00307     }
00308     ret_code = 0;
00309 Cleanup:
00310     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00311     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&prefix);
00312     free(cmd);
00313     return (ret_code);
00314 }

00316 /*
00317  *   (udp|tcp) host [port [mcastttl [mcastif]]]
00318  */
00319 int
00320 ccndc_create(struct ccndc_data *self,
00321              int check_only,
00322              const char *cmd_orig)
00323 {
00324     int ret_code = -1;
00325     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00326     char *cmd_proto = NULL;
00327     char *cmd_host = NULL;
00328     char *cmd_port = NULL;
00329     char *cmd_mcastttl = NULL;
00330     char *cmd_mcastif = NULL;
00331     struct ccn_face_instance *face = NULL;
00332     struct ccn_face_instance *newface = NULL;
00333     
00334     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00335         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00336         return -1;
00337     }
00338     
00339     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00340     if (cmd == NULL) {
00341         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00342         return -1;
00343     }            
00344     cmd_token = cmd;
00345     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_proto);
00346     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_host);
00347     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_port);
00348     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastttl);
00349     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastif);
00350     
00351     // perform sanity checking
00352     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, cmd_proto, cmd_host, cmd_port,
00353                                    cmd_mcastttl, cmd_mcastif, self->lifetime);
00354     if (face == NULL)
00355         goto Cleanup;
00356     
00357     if (!check_only) {
00358         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00359         if (newface == NULL) {
00360             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00361             goto Cleanup;
00362         }
00363         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00364     }
00365     ret_code = 0;
00366 Cleanup:
00367     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00368     free(cmd);
00369     return (ret_code);
00370 }    
00371 
00372 /*
00373  *   (udp|tcp) host [port [mcastttl [mcastif]]]
00374  */
00375 int
00376 ccndc_destroy(struct ccndc_data *self,
00377               int check_only,
00378               const char *cmd_orig)
00379 {
00380     int ret_code = -1;
00381     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00382     char *cmd_proto = NULL;
00383     char *cmd_host = NULL;
00384     char *cmd_port = NULL;
00385     char *cmd_mcastttl = NULL;
00386     char *cmd_mcastif = NULL;
00387     struct ccn_face_instance *face = NULL;
00388     struct ccn_face_instance *newface = NULL;
00389     
00390     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00391         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00392         return -1;
00393     }
00394     
00395     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00396     if (cmd == NULL) {
00397         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00398         return -1;
00399     }            
00400     cmd_token = cmd;
00401     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_proto);
00402     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_host);
00403     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_port);
00404     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastttl);
00405     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastif);
00406     
00407     // perform sanity checking
00408     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, cmd_proto, cmd_host, cmd_port,
00409                                    cmd_mcastttl, cmd_mcastif, (~0U) >> 1);
00410     if (face == NULL)
00411         goto Cleanup;
00412     
00413     if (!check_only) {
00414         // TODO: should use queryface when implemented
00415         if (0 != strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "face")) {
00416             newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00417             if (newface == NULL) {
00418                 ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00419                 goto Cleanup;
00420             }
00421             face->faceid = newface->faceid;
00422             ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00423         }
00424         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "destroyface", face);
00425         if (newface == NULL) {
00426             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot destroy face %d or the face does not exist\n", face->faceid);
00427             goto Cleanup;
00428         }
00429         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00430     }  
00431     ret_code = 0;
00432 Cleanup:
00433     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00434     free(cmd);
00435     return ret_code;
00436 }    
00437 
00438 /*
00439  *   (udp|tcp) host [port [mcastttl [mcastif]]]
00440  */
00441 /*
00442  *   uri (udp|tcp) host [port [flags [mcastttl [mcastif]]]])
00443  *   uri face faceid
00444  */
00445 int
00446 ccndc_renew(struct ccndc_data *self,
00447             int check_only,
00448             const char *cmd_orig)
00449 {
00450     int ret_code = -1;
00451     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00452     char *cmd_uri = NULL;
00453     char *cmd_proto = NULL;
00454     char *cmd_host = NULL;
00455     char *cmd_port = NULL;
00456     char *cmd_flags = NULL;
00457     char *cmd_mcastttl = NULL;
00458     char *cmd_mcastif = NULL;
00459     struct ccn_face_instance *face = NULL;
00460     struct ccn_face_instance *newface = NULL;
00461     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *prefix = NULL;
00462     
00463     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00464         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00465         return -1;
00466     }
00467     
00468     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00469     if (cmd == NULL) {
00470         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00471         return -1;
00472     }            
00473     cmd_token = cmd;
00474     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_uri);
00475     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_proto);
00476     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_host);
00477     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_port);
00478     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_flags);
00479     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastttl);
00480     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_mcastif);
00481     
00482     // perform sanity checking
00483     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, cmd_proto, cmd_host, cmd_port,
00484                                    cmd_mcastttl, cmd_mcastif, (~0U) >> 1);
00485     prefix = parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(self, cmd_uri, cmd_flags, self->lifetime);
00486     if (face == NULL || prefix == NULL)
00487         goto Cleanup;
00488     
00489     if (!check_only) {
00490         // look up the old face ("queryface" would be useful)
00491         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00492         if (newface == NULL) {
00493             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00494             goto Cleanup;
00495         }
00496         face->faceid = newface->faceid;
00497         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00498         // destroy the old face
00499         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "destroyface", face);
00500         if (newface == NULL) {
00501             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot destroy face %d or the face does not exist\n", face->faceid);
00502             goto Cleanup;
00503         }
00504         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00505         // recreate the face
00506         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00507         if (newface == NULL) {
00508             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00509             goto Cleanup;
00510         }
00511         prefix->faceid = newface->faceid;
00512         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00513         // and add the prefix to it
00514         ret_code = ccndc_do_prefix_action(self, "prefixreg", prefix);
00515         if (ret_code < 0) {
00516             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot register prefix [%s]\n", cmd_uri);
00517             goto Cleanup;
00518         }
00519     }  
00520     ret_code = 0;
00521 Cleanup:
00522     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00523     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&prefix);
00524     free(cmd);
00525     return (ret_code);
00526 }
00527 
00528 
00529 int
00530 ccndc_destroyface(struct ccndc_data *self,
00531                   int check_only,
00532                   const char *cmd_orig)
00533 {
00534     int ret_code = 0;
00535     char *cmd, *cmd_token;
00536     char *cmd_faceid = NULL;
00537     struct ccn_face_instance *face;
00538     struct ccn_face_instance *newface;
00539     
00540     if (cmd_orig == NULL) {
00541         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error\n");
00542         return -1;
00543     }
00544     
00545     cmd = strdup(cmd_orig);
00546     if (cmd == NULL) {
00547         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot allocate memory for copy of the command\n");
00548         return -1;
00549     }            
00550     
00551     cmd_token = cmd;    
00552     GET_NEXT_TOKEN(cmd_token, cmd_faceid);
00553     
00554     face = parse_ccn_face_instance_from_face(self, cmd_faceid);
00555     if (face == NULL) {
00556         ret_code = -1;
00557     }
00558     
00559     if (ret_code == 0 && check_only == 0) {
00560         newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "destroyface", face);
00561         if (newface == NULL) {
00562             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot destroy face %d or the face does not exist\n", face->faceid);        
00563         }
00564         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00565     }
00566     
00567     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00568     free(cmd);
00569     return ret_code;
00570 }
00571 
00572 
00573 int
00574 ccndc_srv(struct ccndc_data *self,
00575           const unsigned char *domain,
00576           size_t domain_size)
00577 {
00578     char *proto = NULL;
00579     char *host = NULL;
00580     int port = 0;
00581     char port_str[10];
00582     struct ccn_charbuf *uri;
00583     struct ccn_charbuf *uri_auto;
00584     struct ccn_face_instance *face;
00585     struct ccn_face_instance *newface;
00586     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *prefix;
00587     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *prefix_auto;
00588     int res;
00589     
00590     res = ccndc_query_srv(domain, domain_size, &host, &port, &proto);
00591     if (res < 0) {
00592         return -1;
00593     }
00594     
00595     uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
00596     ccn_charbuf_append_string(uri, "ccnx:/");
00597     if (domain_size != 0) {
00598         ccn_uri_append_percentescaped(uri, domain, domain_size);
00599     }
00600     
00601     snprintf (port_str, sizeof(port_str), "%d", port);
00602     
00603     /* now process the results */
00604     /* pflhead, lineno=0, "add" "ccnx:/asdfasdf.com/" "tcp|udp", host, portstring, NULL NULL NULL */
00605     
00606     ccndc_note(__LINE__, " >>> trying:   add %s %s %s %s <<<\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri), proto, host, port_str);
00607     
00608     face = parse_ccn_face_instance(self, proto, host, port_str, NULL, NULL,
00609                                    (~0U) >> 1);
00610     
00611     prefix = parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(self, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri), NULL,
00612                                         self->lifetime);
00613     if (face == NULL || prefix == NULL) {
00614         res = -1;
00615         goto Cleanup;
00616     }
00617     
00618     // crazy operation
00619     // First. "Create" face, which will do nothing if face already exists
00620     // Second. Destroy the face
00621     // Third. Create face for real
00622     
00623     newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00624     if (newface == NULL) {
00625         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00626         res = -1;
00627         goto Cleanup;
00628     }
00629     
00630     face->faceid = newface->faceid;
00631     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00632     
00633     newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "destroyface", face);
00634     if (newface == NULL) {
00635         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot destroy face");
00636     } else {
00637         ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00638     }
00639     
00640     newface = ccndc_do_face_action(self, "newface", face);
00641     if (newface == NULL) {
00642         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot create/lookup face");
00643         res = -1;
00644         goto Cleanup;
00645     }
00646     
00647     prefix->faceid = newface->faceid;
00648     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&newface);
00649     
00650     res = ccndc_do_prefix_action(self, "prefixreg", prefix);
00651     if (res < 0) {
00652         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot register prefix [%s]\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri));
00653     }
00654 
00655     uri_auto = ccn_charbuf_create();
00656     ccn_charbuf_append_string(uri_auto, "ccnx:/autoconf-route");
00657     prefix_auto = parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(self, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri_auto), NULL,
00658                                         self->lifetime);
00659     if (prefix_auto == NULL) {
00660         res = -1;
00661         goto Cleanup;
00662     }
00663 
00664     prefix_auto->faceid = prefix->faceid;
00665     res = ccndc_do_prefix_action(self, "prefixreg", prefix_auto);
00666     if (res < 0) {
00667         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot register prefix_auto [%s]\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri_auto));
00668     }
00669     
00670 Cleanup:
00671     free(host);
00672     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00673     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri_auto);
00674     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face);
00675     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&prefix);
00676     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&prefix_auto);
00677     return res;
00678 }
00679 
00680 
00681 struct ccn_forwarding_entry *
00682 parse_ccn_forwarding_entry(struct ccndc_data *self,
00683                            const char *cmd_uri,
00684                            const char *cmd_flags,
00685                            int freshness)
00686 {
00687     int res = 0;
00688     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *entry;
00689     
00690     entry= calloc(1, sizeof(*entry));
00691     if (entry == NULL) {
00692         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Fatal error: memory allocation failed");
00693         goto ExitOnError;
00694     }
00695     
00696     entry->name_prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00697     if (entry->name_prefix == NULL) {
00698         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Fatal error: memory allocation failed");
00699         goto ExitOnError;
00700     }
00701     
00702     // copy static info
00703     entry->ccnd_id = (const unsigned char *)self->ccnd_id;
00704     entry->ccnd_id_size = self->ccnd_id_size;
00705     
00706     /* we will be creating the face to either add/delete a prefix on it */
00707     if (cmd_uri == NULL) {
00708         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command erro, missing CCNx URI\n");
00709         goto ExitOnError;
00710     }
00711     
00712     res = ccn_name_from_uri(entry->name_prefix, cmd_uri);
00713     if (res < 0) {
00714         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, bad CCNx URI '%s'\n", cmd_uri);
00715         goto ExitOnError;
00716     }
00717     
00718     entry->flags = -1;
00719     if (cmd_flags != NULL && cmd_flags[0] != 0) {
00720         char *endptr;
00721         entry->flags = strtol(cmd_flags, &endptr, 10);
00722         if ((endptr != &cmd_flags[strlen(cmd_flags)]) ||
00723             (entry->flags & ~CCN_FORW_PUBMASK) != 0) {
00724             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, invalid flags %s\n", cmd_flags);
00725             goto ExitOnError;
00726         }
00727     }
00728     
00729     entry->lifetime = freshness;
00730     return (entry);
00731     
00732 ExitOnError:
00733     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&entry);
00734     return (NULL);
00735 }
00736 
00737 
00738 // creates a full structure without action, if proto == "face" only the
00739 // faceid (from cmd_host parameter) and lifetime will be filled in.
00740 struct ccn_face_instance *
00741 parse_ccn_face_instance(struct ccndc_data *self,
00742                         const char *cmd_proto,
00743                         const char *cmd_host,     const char *cmd_port,
00744                         const char *cmd_mcastttl, const char *cmd_mcastif,
00745                         int freshness)
00746 {
00747     struct ccn_face_instance *entry;
00748     struct addrinfo hints = {.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC, .ai_flags = (AI_ADDRCONFIG)};
00749     struct addrinfo mcasthints = {.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC, .ai_flags = (AI_ADDRCONFIG | AI_NUMERICHOST)};
00750     struct addrinfo *raddrinfo = NULL;
00751     struct addrinfo *mcastifaddrinfo = NULL;
00752     char rhostnamebuf [NI_MAXHOST];
00753     char rhostportbuf [NI_MAXSERV];
00754     int off_address = -1, off_port = -1, off_source_address = -1;
00755     int res;
00756     int socktype;
00757     
00758     entry = calloc(1, sizeof(*entry));
00759     if (entry == NULL) {
00760         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Fatal error: memory allocation failed");
00761         goto ExitOnError;
00762     }
00763     // allocate storage for Face data
00764     entry->store = ccn_charbuf_create();
00765     if (entry->store == NULL) {
00766         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Fatal error: memory allocation failed");
00767         goto ExitOnError;
00768     }
00769     // copy static info
00770     entry->ccnd_id = (const unsigned char *)self->ccnd_id;
00771     entry->ccnd_id_size = self->ccnd_id_size;
00772     
00773     if (cmd_proto == NULL) {
00774         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, missing address type\n");
00775         goto ExitOnError;
00776     }
00777     if (strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "udp") == 0) {
00778         entry->descr.ipproto = IPPROTO_UDP;
00779         socktype = SOCK_DGRAM;
00780     } else if (strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "tcp") == 0) {
00781         entry->descr.ipproto = IPPROTO_TCP;
00782         socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00783     } else if (strcasecmp(cmd_proto, "face") == 0) {
00784         errno = 0;
00785         unsigned long faceid = strtoul(cmd_host, (char **)NULL, 10);
00786         if (errno == ERANGE || errno == EINVAL || faceid > UINT_MAX || faceid == 0) {
00787             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, face number invalid or out of range '%s'\n", cmd_host);
00788             goto ExitOnError;
00789         }
00790         entry->faceid = (unsigned) faceid;
00791         entry->lifetime = freshness;
00792         return (entry);
00793     } else {
00794         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, unrecognized address type '%s'\n", cmd_proto);
00795         goto ExitOnError;
00796     }
00797     
00798     if (cmd_host == NULL) {
00799         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, missing hostname\n");
00800         goto ExitOnError;
00801     }
00802     
00803     if (cmd_port == NULL || cmd_port[0] == 0)
00804         cmd_port = CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT;
00805     
00806     hints.ai_socktype = socktype;
00807     res = getaddrinfo(cmd_host, cmd_port, &hints, &raddrinfo);
00808     if (res != 0 || raddrinfo == NULL) {
00809         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, getaddrinfo for host [%s] port [%s]: %s\n", cmd_host, cmd_port, gai_strerror(res));
00810         goto ExitOnError;
00811     }
00812     res = getnameinfo(raddrinfo->ai_addr, raddrinfo->ai_addrlen,
00813                       rhostnamebuf, sizeof(rhostnamebuf),
00814                       rhostportbuf, sizeof(rhostportbuf),
00815                       NI_NUMERICHOST | NI_NUMERICSERV);
00816     freeaddrinfo(raddrinfo);
00817     if (res != 0) {
00818         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, getnameinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(res));
00819         goto ExitOnError;
00820     }
00821     
00822     off_address = entry->store->length;
00823     res = ccn_charbuf_append(entry->store, rhostnamebuf, strlen(rhostnamebuf)+1);
00824     if (res != 0) {
00825         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot append to charbuf");
00826         goto ExitOnError;
00827     }
00828     
00829     off_port = entry->store->length;
00830     res = ccn_charbuf_append(entry->store, rhostportbuf, strlen(rhostportbuf)+1);
00831     if (res != 0) {
00832         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot append to charbuf");
00833         goto ExitOnError;
00834     }
00835     
00836     entry->descr.mcast_ttl = -1;
00837     if (cmd_mcastttl != NULL) {
00838         char *endptr;
00839         entry->descr.mcast_ttl = strtol(cmd_mcastttl, &endptr, 10); 
00840         if ((endptr != &cmd_mcastttl[strlen(cmd_mcastttl)]) ||
00841             entry->descr.mcast_ttl < 0 || entry->descr.mcast_ttl > 255) {
00842             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, invalid multicast ttl: %s\n", cmd_mcastttl);
00843             goto ExitOnError;
00844         }
00845     }
00846     
00847     if (cmd_mcastif != NULL) {
00848         res = getaddrinfo(cmd_mcastif, NULL, &mcasthints, &mcastifaddrinfo);
00849         if (res != 0) {
00850             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, incorrect multicat interface [%s]: "
00851                        "mcastifaddr getaddrinfo: %s\n", cmd_mcastif, gai_strerror(res));
00852             goto ExitOnError;
00853         }
00854         
00855         res = getnameinfo(mcastifaddrinfo->ai_addr, mcastifaddrinfo->ai_addrlen,
00856                           rhostnamebuf, sizeof(rhostnamebuf),
00857                           NULL, 0,
00858                           NI_NUMERICHOST | NI_NUMERICSERV);
00859         freeaddrinfo(mcastifaddrinfo);
00860         if (res != 0) {
00861             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, getnameinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(res));
00862             goto ExitOnError;
00863         }
00864         
00865         off_source_address = entry->store->length;
00866         res = ccn_charbuf_append(entry->store, rhostnamebuf, strlen(rhostnamebuf)+1);
00867         if (res != 0) {
00868             ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Cannot append to charbuf");
00869             goto ExitOnError;
00870         }
00871     }
00872     
00873     entry->descr.address = (const char *)(entry->store->buf + off_address);
00874     entry->descr.port = (const char *)(entry->store->buf + off_port);
00875     if (off_source_address >= 0) {
00876         entry->descr.source_address = (const char *)(entry->store->buf + off_source_address);
00877     }
00878     
00879     entry->lifetime = freshness;
00880     
00881     return entry;
00882     
00883 ExitOnError:
00884     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&entry);
00885     return (NULL);
00886 }
00887 
00888 struct ccn_face_instance *
00889 parse_ccn_face_instance_from_face(struct ccndc_data *self,
00890                                   const char *cmd_faceid)
00891 {
00892     struct ccn_face_instance *entry = calloc(1, sizeof(*entry));
00893     
00894     // allocate storage for Face data
00895     entry->store = ccn_charbuf_create();
00896     
00897     // copy static info
00898     entry->ccnd_id = (const unsigned char *)self->ccnd_id;
00899     entry->ccnd_id_size = self->ccnd_id_size;
00900     
00901     /* destroy a face - the URI field will hold the face number */
00902     if (cmd_faceid == NULL) {
00903         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error, missing face number for destroyface\n");
00904         goto ExitOnError;
00905     }
00906     
00907     char *endptr;
00908     int facenumber = strtol(cmd_faceid, &endptr, 10);
00909     if ((endptr != &cmd_faceid[strlen(cmd_faceid)]) ||
00910         facenumber < 0) {
00911         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "command error invalid face number for destroyface: %d\n", facenumber);
00912         goto ExitOnError;
00913     }
00914     
00915     entry->faceid = facenumber;
00916     
00917     return entry;
00918     
00919 ExitOnError:
00920     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&entry);
00921     return (NULL);
00922 }
00923 
00924 
00925 
00926 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00927 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00928 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00929 // "private section
00930 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00931 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00932 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00933 
00934 int
00935 ccndc_get_ccnd_id(struct ccndc_data *self)
00936 {
00937     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00938     struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf = NULL;
00939     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcobuf = {0};
00940     char ccndid_uri[] = "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd/KEY";
00941     const unsigned char *ccndid_result;
00942     int res = 0;
00943     
00944     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00945     if (name == NULL) {
00946         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Unable to allocate storage for service locator name charbuf\n");
00947         return -1;
00948     }
00949     
00950     resultbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
00951     if (resultbuf == NULL) {
00952         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Unable to allocate storage for result charbuf");
00953         res = -1;
00954         goto Cleanup;
00955     }
00956     
00957     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, ccndid_uri);
00958     if (res < 0) {
00959         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Unable to parse service locator URI for ccnd key");
00960         goto Cleanup;
00961     }
00962     
00963     res = ccn_get(self->ccn_handle,
00964                   name,
00965                   self->local_scope_template,
00966                   4500, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0);
00967     if (res < 0) {
00968         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Unable to get key from ccnd");
00969         goto Cleanup;
00970     }
00971     
00972     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB (CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
00973                                resultbuf->buf,
00974                                pcobuf.offset[CCN_PCO_B_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00975                                pcobuf.offset[CCN_PCO_E_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00976                                &ccndid_result, &self->ccnd_id_size);
00977     if (res < 0) {
00978         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Unable to parse ccnd response for ccnd id");
00979         goto Cleanup;
00980     }
00981     
00982     if (self->ccnd_id_size > sizeof (self->ccnd_id))
00983     {
00984         ccndc_warn(__LINE__, "Incorrect size for ccnd id in response");
00985         goto Cleanup;
00986     }
00987     
00988     memcpy(self->ccnd_id, ccndid_result, self->ccnd_id_size);
00989     
00990 Cleanup:
00991     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00992     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
00993     return (res);
00994 }
00995 
00996 
00997 struct ccn_face_instance *
00998 ccndc_do_face_action(struct ccndc_data *self,
00999                      const char *action,
01000                      struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance)
01001 {
01002     struct ccn_charbuf *newface = NULL;
01003     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
01004     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
01005     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
01006     struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf = NULL;
01007     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcobuf = {0};
01008     struct ccn_face_instance *new_face_instance = NULL;
01009     const unsigned char *ptr = NULL;
01010     size_t length = 0;
01011     int res = 0;
01012     
01013     face_instance->action = action;
01014     
01015     /* Encode the given face instance */
01016     newface = ccn_charbuf_create();
01017     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(newface);
01018     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccnb_append_face_instance(newface, face_instance));
01019     
01020     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
01021     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(temp);
01022     res = ccn_sign_content(self->ccn_handle, temp, self->no_name, NULL, newface->buf, newface->length);
01023     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(res);
01024     resultbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
01025     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(resultbuf);
01026     
01027     /* Construct the Interest name that will create the face */
01028     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01029     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(name);
01030     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_init(name));
01031     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append_str(name, "ccnx"));
01032     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append(name, face_instance->ccnd_id, face_instance->ccnd_id_size));
01033     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append_str(name, face_instance->action));
01034     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append(name, temp->buf, temp->length));
01035     
01036     res = ccn_get(self->ccn_handle, name, self->local_scope_template, 1000, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0);
01037     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(res);
01038     
01039     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_content_get_value(resultbuf->buf, resultbuf->length, &pcobuf, &ptr, &length));
01040     new_face_instance = ccn_face_instance_parse(ptr, length);
01041     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(new_face_instance);
01042     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&newface);
01043     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
01044     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
01045     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
01046     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01047     return (new_face_instance);
01048     
01049 Cleanup:
01050     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&newface);
01051     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
01052     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
01053     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
01054     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01055     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&new_face_instance);
01056     return (NULL);
01057 }
01058 
01059 int
01060 ccndc_do_prefix_action(struct ccndc_data *self,
01061                        const char *action,
01062                        struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry)
01063 {
01064     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
01065     struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf = NULL;
01066     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
01067     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
01068     struct ccn_charbuf *prefixreg = NULL;
01069     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcobuf = {0};
01070     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *new_forwarding_entry = NULL;
01071     
01072     const unsigned char *ptr = NULL;
01073     size_t length = 0;
01074     int res;
01075     
01076     forwarding_entry->action = action;
01077     
01078     prefixreg = ccn_charbuf_create();
01079     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(prefixreg);
01080     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(prefixreg, forwarding_entry));
01081     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
01082     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(temp);
01083     res = ccn_sign_content(self->ccn_handle, temp, self->no_name, NULL, prefixreg->buf, prefixreg->length);
01084     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(res);    
01085     resultbuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
01086     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(resultbuf);
01087     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
01088     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_init(name));
01089     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append_str(name, "ccnx"));
01090     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append(name, forwarding_entry->ccnd_id, forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size));
01091     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append_str(name, forwarding_entry->action));
01092     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_name_append(name, temp->buf, temp->length));
01093     res = ccn_get(self->ccn_handle, name, self->local_scope_template, 1000, resultbuf, &pcobuf, NULL, 0);
01094     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(res);
01095     ON_ERROR_CLEANUP(ccn_content_get_value(resultbuf->buf, resultbuf->length, &pcobuf, &ptr, &length));
01096     new_forwarding_entry = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(ptr, length);
01097     ON_NULL_CLEANUP(new_forwarding_entry);
01098     
01099     res = new_forwarding_entry->faceid;
01100     
01101     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&new_forwarding_entry);
01102     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
01103     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
01104     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
01105     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01106     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&prefixreg);
01107     
01108     return (res);
01109     
01110     /* This is where ON_ERROR_CLEANUP sends us in case of an error
01111      * and we must free any storage we allocated before returning.
01112      */
01113 Cleanup:
01114     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
01115     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
01116     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&resultbuf);
01117     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01118     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&prefixreg);
01119     
01120     return (-1);
01121 }
